review_data.content: The atmosphere of the place is most comfortable with relaxing furniture around the place from wooden furniture 🪑 on the left side of the room, to padded antique furniture on the opposite side. Numerous disco balls, ceiling light fixtures, old/ collectibles, Polaroid photos, LP‘s and...More

review_data.title: Wonderful place
review_data.content: We loved the Elisaburg! We were made very welcome, food and drinks were great, and the decor gives it a cosy atmosphere that we really enjoyed. We will definitely be back next time we're in Zurich!

review_data.title: Geburtstagsfeier in der Elisaburg

review_data.title: Really special - with max cozyness factor
review_data.content: We just walked by and decided to have a look inside. What a discovery! The interior is super-cozy and the owners are local super-darlings. Prices are more than reasonable. Must-go!
